amendment.description: Strike subsection (h) of section 3 (relating to exceptional events).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 115-229 to strike subsection (h) of section 3 (relating to exceptional events).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 235 (Roll no. 387).
